column4: Is there some way to get better ATI graphic card support than just installing the proprietary driver? Such as using wine to run the windows drivers?
Not really. Emulating almost never has any luck with hardware rendering
Proprietary is best your going to get. You could also try the bleeding edge SVN versions but not worth the effort
movies are pretty choppy and look more Pixelated than they should, haven't tried playing any 3d intense games
yes they do now and then
Did you try disabling desktop effects ?
I had them disabled before, I have them set to "Normal" atm
I have problems with movies on my ATI card when effects are enabled
ok I will try turning them off
Turning down all the 3d settings and turning off effects seems to have improved videos though still skips a frame here and there
Humm, I only have the problem with the effects enabled
can't help you anymore than that :(
